mapper.insert: insert into USER_CHAT( SEND_USER, RECV_USER, CHAT_MSG, CHAT_CREATE_DATE, CHAT_VIEW_AVAILABLE ) values(#{sendUser.id},#{recvUser.id},#{contents},sysdate,'N')
mapper.select: select SEND_USER, RECV_USER, CHAT_MSG, CHAT_CREATE_DATE, CHAT_VIEW_AVAILABLE from USER_CHAT where RECV_USER = #{value}

select SEND_USER, RECV_USER, CHAT_MSG, CHAT_CREATE_DATE, CHAT_VIEW_AVAILABLE from USER_CHAT where (RECV_USER = #{recvUser.id} and SEND_USER = #{sendUser.id}) or (RECV_USER = #{sendUser.id} and SEND_USER = #{recvUser.id}) order by CHAT_CREATE_DATE
select count(*) from USER_CHAT where RECV_USER = #{value} and CHAT_VIEW_AVAILABLE = 'N'
